plot outline: Saranalayam is an old age home where Marykutty teacher, Parvathy Amma and Saraswathi Amma stay. Eradi is the owner of Saranalayam and he is running out of funds to continue running it. He employs Vivek as the new manager of Saranalayam. Vivek's mission is to evict Saranalayam so that Eradi can sell it. In the mean time Akhila comes to Saranalayam with her mother Janaki who is mentally ill. Vivek, who is an orphan gets touched by the love of all the mothers staying at Saranalayam and he realises that he can't evict the place...
title: Ammakilikkoodu
plot: Saranalayam is an old-age home run by Eradi. He appoints Vivek as the new manager to help him evict the inmates as he wants to sell it.

Saranalayam is an old age home where Marykutty teacher, Parvathy Amma and Saraswathi Amma stay. Eradi is the owner of Saranalayam and he is running out of funds to continue running it. He employs Vivek as the new manager of Saranalayam. Vivek's mission is to evict Saranalayam so that Eradi can sell it. In the mean time Akhila comes to Saranalayam with her mother Janaki who is mentally ill. Vivek, who is an orphan gets touched by the love of all the mothers staying at Saranalayam and he realises that he can't evict the place...::tojo
